channel.title: Help with a [pi] problem
channel.description:
Ive looked everywhere and i cannot find a detailed tutorial on this subject.
basiclly me and my friend run a server , were trying to make pvp everywhere except the bank in edgeville. its working but the problem is its going into -1 as we go south. the more we go north it goes +1. so how can i edit this ?
